Eligibility Requirements for Veterans Who Served as Special or “New” Philippine Scouts
Special or “new” Philippine Scouts whose only service began on or after October 6, 1945, under
PL 79-190
, are entitled
only
to SC compensation and clothing allowance benefits.  Their dependents are entitled only to SC death benefits and burial allowance.
Reference
:  For more information on benefits payable for Philippine service, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.A.2
and
B
.
